SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am01
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.model.card.face

Interface CardFace

All Known Implementing Classes:
BackCardFace, BaseCardFace, FrontCardFace
public interface CardFace
This interface defines all the methods for BaseCardFace. The default implementation of each method is defined in BaseCardFace
See Also:
  • BaseCardFace

    Method
    Description
    Corner
    corner(CornerPosition cornerPosition)
    This method provides the Corner located in a specific CornerPosition
    Map<Resource,Integer>
    getCenterResources()
    This method provides all center Resource of a card face

    This method provides the requirements for a card placement
    Optional<Points>
    getPoints()
    This method provides all data on how to get points through a CardPlacement

  • Method Details

    • corner

      Corner corner(CornerPosition cornerPosition)
      This method provides the Corner located in a specific CornerPosition
      Parameters:
      cornerPosition - the position of the required Corner
      Returns:
      the Corner of card at cornerPosition
      See Also:
      • Corner
      • CornerPosition

    • getPoints

      Optional<Points> getPoints()
      This method provides all data on how to get points through a CardPlacement
      Returns:
      a Points if the card has a "score" associated with it, otherwise an Optional.empty()
      See Also:
      • FrontCardFace
      • Points
      • PlayArea.CardPlacement

    • getPlacementConstraint

      Optional<PlacementConstraint> getPlacementConstraint()
      This method provides the requirements for a card placement
      Returns:
      a PlacementConstraint if the card has placement requirements, otherwise an Optional.empty()
      See Also:
      • FrontCardFace
      • PlacementConstraint

    • getCenterResources

      Map<Resource,Integer> getCenterResources()
      This method provides all center Resource of a card face
      Returns:
      a map that contains the amount of each Resource
      See Also:
      • BackCardFace
      • Resource
